description: Describes the specified EBS volumes or all of your EBS volumes.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: The DescribeVolumes API call can reveal information about EBS volumes which might contain details about the accounts that created or use them.

DescribeVolumes allows attackers to list and understand the configuration of EBS volumes within a cloud environment. This information helps map out the storage resources, potentially revealing sensitive data or misconfigurations.
By describing volumes, attackers can infer the permissions set on EBS volumes and potentially discover groups with access to these volumes
Volumes can be linked to container storage. Discovering volumes helps in mapping container usage and dependencies
